Name: Paula Cristina Hernandez
Description:
Paula's decomposing body was found in a cane field on Saturday 22nd September. She had been strangled and beaten around the head, and had been dead for approximately 72 hours.

Paula had been reported missing by her relatives on 19th September.

Her murder was not recorded on the official TDoR 2007 list collated by https://tdor.info.

http://www.cepresi.org.ni/noticias?idnoticia=42
